Q_DESC:
Write a menu driven program to insert elements and delete elements in binary search tree
1-to insert element
2-to delete the element
3-for inorder traversal of the tree
The program runs until user enters 0

INPUT
First line contains the choice of the user

OUTPUT
The output prints the following task
TESTCASE_1:
1
7
50 30 20 40 70 60 80
3
2
20
3
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Inorder traversal of the tree
20 30 40 50 60 70 80 
Element deleted is 20
Inorder traversal of the tree
30 40 50 60 70 80
TESTCASE_2:
1
5
14 20 47 65 9
3
2
14
3
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Inorder traversal of the tree
9 14 20 47 65 
Element deleted is 14
Inorder traversal of the tree
9 20 47 65
TESTCASE_3:
1
3
2 1 3
2
1
3
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Element deleted is 1
Inorder traversal of the tree
2 3
